import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function Signup() { const [creadentials, setCreadentials] = useState({fname:"",lname:"", email: "", password: "", }); let navigate = useNavigate() const host = `http://localhost:3001`; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const url = `${host}/loginUser`; const response = await fetch(url, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ email: creadentials.email, password: creadentials.password }), }); const json = await response.json(); console.log(json); if (json.status) { localStorage.setItem('token', json.data.token) navigate('/') } else { alert("Invalid Creadentials") } }; const handleOnchange = (e) => { setCreadentials({ ...creadentials, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
) } export default Signup
